name: Fucker
description: How well you can please a partner sexually.

name: Runner
description: How far and fast you can run, to flee combat or travel quickly.

name: Sneak
description: How well you can evade detection, pick pockets, avoid combat, and generally go unnoticed.

name: Player
description: How skilled you are at arousing others and convincing them to have sex with you.

name: Talker
description: How well you converse with others. Influence, interrogate, threaten and amuse.

name: Chemist
description: How experienced you are at creating and using drugs. This includes chems and alcohol.

name: Traveller
description: How well you travel the hellscape. Find interesting locations, manage survival resources, evade enemies and travel faster.

name: Fighter
description: How well you can fight in hand-to-hand combat.

name: Healer
description: How well you can heal yourself and others.

name: Hacker
description: How well you work with electornic tech, including computers and robots.

name: Merchant
description: How well you can haggle with others and secure better prices and rewards.

name: Marksman
description: How well you can shoot with guns and other ranged weapons.

name: Tinkerer
description: How well you work with mechanical tech, including machines, guns, and locks.

name: Pitcher
description: How hard and how accurately you can throw things. Toss bombs and knives at enemies, pass items to allies, and throw held enemies.

name: Wrestler
description: How well you can grab, hold, and otherwise subdue an enemy.

name: Swordsman
description: How well you can fight with melee weapons.
